items.sentence: The language of love is difficult and complicated, no matter where you\'re from.
I think parents should sing with their children more often than most parents do.
It\'s a very dangerous sport, where a slight mistake can lead to serious injury.
Tom has been told to do that more than three times and he still hasn\'t done it.
Tom never drinks at home, but he sometimes goes out and drinks with his friends.
Both Tom and Mary have Boston addresses, even though they don\'t live there now.
Tom doesn\'t know when it\'ll happen, but he\'s pretty sure that it will happen.
You could search the world over and never find another man more honest than Tom.
Keep your eyes on Tom. Make sure he doesn\'t do anything to bother other people.
I don\'t play the clarinet very well, but I\'m pretty good at playing the flute.
